 1998-17091998-09-240,  IA&ND,  ,  , 
PrecisORDER PRESCRIBING THE MAXIMUM TOTAL AMOUNT FOR AGREEMENTS INVOLVING LEASES OF RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY - which authorizes the Interim Commissioner of Nunavut to lease residential properties without seeking the approval of the Governor in Council where the total cost involved does not exceed a threshold of $15,000,000.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0474 Publication Date: 1998-10-14
